Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: numberOfColumns(in:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of columns in the spreadsheet view.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: numberOfRows(in:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the number of rows in spreadsheet view.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: spreadsheetView(_:widthForColumn:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source for the width to use for a row in a specified location.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: spreadsheetView(_:heightForRow:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source for the height to use for a row in a specified location.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: spreadsheetView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks your data source object for the view that corresponds to the specified cell in the spreadsheetView.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: mergedCells(in:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks your data source object for the array of cell ranges that indicate the range of merged cells in the spreadsheetView.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: frozenColumns(in:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of columns to be frozen as a fixed column header in the spreadsheetView.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: frozenRows(in:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of rows to be frozen as a fixed row header in the spreadsheetView.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:shouldHighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate if the cell should be highlighted during tracking.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:didHighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the cell at the specified index path was highlighted.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:didUnhighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the highlight was removed from the cell at the specified index path.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:shouldSelectItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate if the specified cell should be selected.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:shouldDeselectItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Asks the delegate if the specified item should be deselected.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:didSelectItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the cell at the specified index path was selected.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.name: spreadsheetView(_:didDeselectItemAt:)
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the cell at the specified path was deselected.

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html.name: SpreadsheetViewDelegate
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDelegate.html.abstract: The SpreadsheetViewDelegate protocol defines methods that allow you to manage the selection and

Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.name: SpreadsheetViewDataSource
Protocols/SpreadsheetViewDataSource.html.abstract: Implement this protocol to provide data to an SpreadsheetView.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/s:15Spread.name: dataSource
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/s:15Spread.abstract: The object that provides the data for the collection view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/s:15Spread.name: delegate
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/s:15Spread.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the spreadsheet view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: intercellSpacing
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: The horizontal and vertical spacing between cells.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: allowsSelection
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether users can select cells in the spreadsheet view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: allowsMultipleSelection
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether users can select more than one cell in the spreadsheet view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: showsVerticalScrollIndicator
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that controls whether the vertical scroll indicator is visible.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: showsHorizontalScrollIndicator
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that controls whether the horizontal scroll indicator is visible.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: scrollsToTop
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that controls whether the scroll-to-top gesture is enabled.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: backgroundView
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: The view that provides the background appearance.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: safeAreaInsetsDidChange()
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: visibleCells
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: Returns an array of visible cells currently displayed by the spreadsheet view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: indexPathsForVisibleItems
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: An array of the visible items in the collection view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: indexPathForSelectedItem
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: indexPathsForSelectedItems
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: The index paths for the selected items.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: isDirectionalLockEnabled
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether scrolling is disabled in a particular direction.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: bounces
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that controls whether the scroll view bounces past the edge of content and back again.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: alwaysBounceVertical
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether bouncing always occurs when vertical scrolling reaches the end of the content.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: alwaysBounceHorizontal
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether bouncing always occurs when horizontal scrolling reaches the end of the content view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: stickyRowHeader
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines wheather the row header always sticks to the top.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: stickyColumnHeader
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines wheather the column header always sticks to the top.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: isPagingEnabled
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether paging is enabled for the scroll view.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: isScrollEnabled
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether scrolling is enabled.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: indicatorStyle
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: The style of the scroll indicators.

Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.name: decelerationRate
Classes/SpreadsheetView.html#/c:@M@Sprea.abstract: A floating-point value that determines the rate of deceleration after the user lifts their finger.
